post:

Roubaix; France (IPv6 with IPv4 NAT)
---

   * [**RBX-128**](https://i-83.net/account/cart.php?a=add&pid=9)| **$8/year with "LFEB142-128v6"** - 128mb Guaranteed RAM, 5GB HDD, 1 Core, 20 Ports on Shared NAT IPv4, 5 IPv6, 100mbs Unmetered Fair Share Port (DDoS Protected)
   * [**RBX-256**](https://i-83.net/account/cart.php?a=add&pid=10)| **$12/year with "LFEB142-256v6"** - 256mb Guaranteed RAM, 15GB HDD, 1 Core, 20 Ports on Shared NAT IPv4, 5 IPv6, 100mbs Unmetered Fair Share Port (DDoS Protected)

[Order IPv6 VPS in Roubaix](https://i-83.net/account/cart.php?gid=6)

Datacenter Information:
---

   * FR: Paris - Iliad Datacenter
   * FR: Roubaix - OVH (DDoS protected)
   * USA: Phoenix, Arizona - PhoenixNAP


Hardware Information:
---

   * E3-1220/E3-1225/E3-1240/Dual L5520
   * Raid 1, Raid 10
   * 16/32/76 GB RAM

DNS:
---

Free redundant DNS accounts are available on our website for use with your domain, have your DNS available in different continents to prevent any DNS connectivity issues causing your site to be offline.

rDNS - via Support Ticket

No Overselling:
---

Our Nodes are not oversold - You get your allotted specification, there whenever and however you want to use it.

Additional IP's:
---

France - IPv4 N/A, IPv6 by support ticket<br>
Phoenix - IPv4 by ticket @ $1 per IP/month

Support:
---

These are unmanaged VPS servers but our ticket desk is manned 7 days a week.

Billing:
---

We only accept **PayPal** payments. Services will be activated upon payment receipt. Payments will be made in £ via PayPal although our billing area supports USD, EUR & GBP. Voucher Codes are set to price override and are calculated using the exchange rate at the time of post: 6/2.40/3.00/4.27/4.87/7.30 @ 1.63820

Nothing take your fancy?
---

We have a range of products and services on our [website](http://i-83.net) to choose from [cPanel Hosting](http://i-83.net/shared-hosting/) to our [Content Delivery Network](http://i-83.net/content-delivery-network/), feel free to look there and see if we can meet your needs!
